feed.title: St. Peters Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 12:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: ENE 25 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets changing to rain this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 15 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers late in the evening and before morning. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
